original_text: Anyone who picks up their carcasses must wash their clothes, and they will be unclean till evening. These animals are unclean for you.
korean_text: 그 주검을 옮기는 자는 그 옷을 빨지니 저녁까지 부정하리라 그것들이 네게 부정하니라

sentences.original_text: Anyone who picks up their carcasses
and they will be unclean till evening
These animals are unclean for you
